content: i created these 6 halloween ornaments to decorate my tree with you can find the details about the materials needed for each ornament in the blog post **terminology used in all 6 patterns** st s stitch es chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase two single_crochet in one stitch decrease invisible decrease single_crochet two stitches together through the front loops only decrease single_crochet two sts together insert hook into next st yo pull a loop through x 2 yo pull yarn through all 3 loops sc3tog single_crochet three sts together insert hook into next st yo pull a loop through x 3 yo pull yarn through all 4 loops skip st skip the next st blo crochet only in the back loops loop away from you of each st flo crochet only in the front loops look closest to you of each st slip_stitch slip_stitch … x # repeat anything in the parenthesis however many times the number indicates # total number of stitches for that row number single_crochet/slip_stitch/half_double_crochet/double_crochet one single_crochet/slip_stitch/half_double_crochet/double_crochet in the following # stitches single_crochet/slip_stitch/half_double_crochet/double_crochet# single_crochet/slip_stitch/half_double_crochet/double_crochet # of times in the next st
